name: Anahí
religion: Anahí is most likely Roman Catholic.
politicalViews: She is liberal, and is an advocate for non-violence.
author: Caitlin Frye

content.text: Anahí, whose full name is Anahí Giovanna Puente Portilla, was born in Mexico City, Mexico.

My research on Anahí would be a little more thorough if I spoke Spanish, but from what I could tell, the actress doesn't have a whole lot to say about religion. Most websites list her religion as Roman Catholic,
which would be expected considering she comes from a country that is over 80% Catholic.

I couldn't find any information confirming that, but it seems like a good bet to me. Some of the lyrics in her song "Te Puedo Escuchar" imply that she's some sort of Christian, but not necessarily Catholic:

content.sourceTitle: Translation of "Te puedo escuchar" by Anahí from Spanish to English.
content.text: I know that your wings will stay with me/ That even from heaven, your embrace will be my shelter/ Divine angel, you protect me from all that is bad.

content.sourceTitle: Anahi hace campaña en día electoral.
content.text: Anahí supports the Ecologist Green Party of Mexico (PVEM).

content.sourceTitle: Anahí y Manuel Valasco, virtual governador de Chiapas, presumieron su amor en Nueva York.
content.text: Considering she's in a relationship with Manuel Velasco, a PVEM politician, that's probably a good move on her part.

content.sourceTitle: Anahi hace campaña en día electoral.
content.text: She's also a fan of Enrique Nieto, a member of the Institutional Revolutionary Party (PRI), whom she supported during his successful bid for the presidency in 2012.
So I think we can safely say this actress and musician is left of the center.

content.sourceTitle: Invita Yoko Ono a Anahi a la Non Violence Foundation.
content.text: She's also an advocate for non-violence, and has joined the Non-Violence Project as a Latin American ambassador to the campaign.
She frequently uses Twitter to promote her work with the project and encourages her fans to join the movement:

content.sourceTitle: Anahi: La paz es responsibilidad de …
content.text: Peace is the responsibility of all, join the campaign @NVPMexico
